ImprovementType.Description: The Academy of Revelation increases the Research produced by in all your cities.
The Adventurer's Guild has a chance every season of giving champions stationed in a city bonus experience. It also reduces the cost of recruiting champions.

GameModifier.Provides: Stationed champions have a 25% chance of getting 1xp/season

ImprovementType.Description: Air Altars can be built on Air Shards. They amplify Air spells and provide Mana every season.
Air Altars can be built on Air Shards. They amplify Air spells and provide Mana every season.
Air Shrines upgrade from Air Altars. They amplify Air spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Air Shrines upgrade from Air Altars. They amplify Air spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Air Temples upgrade from Air Shrines. They amplify Air spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Air Temples upgrade from Air Shrines. They amplify Air spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Alchemists utilize magic to increase the Mana and Research in a city. Their bonuses scale based on the amount of essence in the city.
Alchemy Labs increase the Material yields, Mana, and Research in a city via the arcane arts. Their bonuses scale based on the amount of essence in the city.
An Almshouse shows a city's compassion for the least of its citizens. They increase a nation's Faction Prestige.
Amethyst Vaults provide Crystal every season without needing to find a Crystal Crag resource
Ancient Temples can only be built on temple ruins. They provide Mana every Season.
Apiaries can be built on Twilight Bees. They provide a city with additional Grain yields and Gildar.
Apothecaries provide Mana every Season and produce consumable potions that champions can purchase. Their bonuses scale based on the amount of Essence in the city.
Archivists increase the Research a city provides when that city's production queue is empty.

GameModifier.Provides: +50% Research when the city is idle

ImprovementType.Description: The Arena has a chance every season to give champions stationed in the city it's constructed in bonus experience.

GameModifier.Provides: Stationed units have a 25% chance of getting 1xp/season

ImprovementType.Description: Armorers reduce the costs of adding armor to units trained in this city while also increasing their base Armor.
Bakeries increase the amount of Food a faction gets from Grain tile yields.

GameModifier.Provides: +10 Food per Grain for your Faction

ImprovementType.Description: Barracks decrease the training time for units trained in this city while also increasing their Accuracy.
Bazaars increase the amount of Gildar a city produces.
Bell Towers keep a city running in an orderly manner by lowering Unrest.
The Black Market reduces the cost of rushing production and increases the Gildar produced by a city, to the detriment of its citizens. As a result it will also increase the Unrest of the city.
Blacksmiths increase the base Armor of every unit trained in a city.
The Brewery will greatly increase the amount of Food a faction gets from Grain tile yields.

GameModifier.Provides: +40 Food per Grain for your faction

ImprovementType.Description: Butchers increase the amount of Food a faction gets from Grain tile yields.

GameModifier.Provides: +20 Food per Grain for your faction

ImprovementType.Description: Darkling camps can be built on Darkling lairs to recruit Darklings.
Fell Dragon Lairs can be built on Dragon lairs to recruit Fell Dragons.
Mercenary camps can be built on Border Villages to recruit Mercenaries.
Ogre camps can be built on Ogre lairs to recruit Ogres.
Order of Asok camps can be built on Order of Asok resources to recruit Knights of Asok.
Storm Dragon Lairs can be built on Dragon lairs to recruit Storm Dragons.
Troll Camps can be built on Troll lairs to recruit Troll Warriors.
Wilding camps can be built on Wilding lairs to recruit Wildings.
Castles bolster a city's defenses by providing them with Archers and giving an Initiative bonus to all of their City Defenders.
Clay Quarries can be built on Clay Pits to add a Material to the attached city.
Cleric's provide healing and aid to the city's inhabitants. They reduce unrest in the city based on its Essence.
Cloisters increase Research in cities they are built in.
Colleges provide a steady increase to research in any city they are built in.
Command Posts improve the training of units, causing them to take less time to train and providing them with a number of bonuses.
Devote this city to research and scholarly pursuits.

GameModifier.Provides: +50% Research when the city is idle

ImprovementType.Description: Crystal Mines upgrade from Crystal Quarries. They provide you with additional Crystal every Season.
Crystal Quarrys can be built on Crystal Deposits. They provide you with Crystal every Season.
Crystal Troves upgrade from Crystal Mines. They provide you with additional Crystal every Season.
Death Altars can be built on Death Shards. They amplify Death spells and provide Mana every season.
Death Altars can be built on Death Shards. They amplify Death spells and provide Mana every season.
Death Shrines upgrade from Death Altars. They amplify Death spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Death Shrines upgrade from Death Altars. They amplify Death spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Death Temples upgrade from Death Shrines. They amplify Death spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Death Temples upgrade from Death Shrines. They amplify Death spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Docks are upgraded from Piers. They increase Gildar and Food in cities they are constructed in.
Earth Altars can be built on Earth Shards. They amplify Earth spells and provide Mana every season.
Earth Altars can be built on Earth Shards. They amplify Earth spells and provide Mana every season.
Earth Shrines upgrade from Earth Altars. They amplify Earth spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Earth Shrines upgrade from Earth Altars. They amplify Earth spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Earth Temples upgrade from Earth Shrines. They amplify Earth spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Earth Temples upgrade from Earth Shrines. They amplify Earth spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Embassies produce Influence every Season.
There is no stairwell in the thin tower, only masters of Air magic can hope to explore the opulent chambers at the towers top.
Farms can be built on Wild Grain. They provide additional Grain yields for a city.
Festivals attract new citizens, increasing growth in cities they are constructed in.
Fire Altars can be built on Fire Shards. They amplify Fire spells and provide Mana every season.
Fire Altars can be built on Fire Shards. They amplify Fire spells and provide Mana every season.
Fire Shrines upgrade from Fire Altars. They amplify Fire spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Fire Shrines upgrade from Fire Altars. They amplify Fire spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Fire Temples upgrade from Fire Shrines. They amplify Fire spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Fire Temples upgrade from Fire Shrines. They amplify Fire spells and provide you with additional Mana every Season.
Forges improve the defense of units trained in a city.
Forts bolster a city's defenses by providing them with Archers and giving an Initiative bonus to all of their City Defenders.
Devote this city to the military and defense.
Foundries upgrade from Smelters. They provide you with additional Metal every Season.
Gallows remind citizens of their civic duty. With them there is no Unrest penalty to Production.
Gardens provide food for the people, increasing the amount of Food provided by Grain yield in cities they are built in.
Gold Mines can be built on Gold Deposits. They produce Gildar every Season.
Governor's Offices increase the production gained from Material yields in all of a nation's cities.

GameModifier.Provides: +1 Production per Material in all your cities

ImprovementType.Description: Granaries greatly increase the amount of food gathered from each Grain yield in a city.
The Great Archive will greatly increase our Research efforts in the city it's constructed in.
Great Arenas toughen the people of a city. They will provide all units trained in a city with Attack and Hit Point bonuses.
The Great Mill provides the city it is constructed in with Food and Production bonuses. In addition, the nation that actually manages to complete it will see a bump in Faction Prestige.
Grocers increase the amount of food cities gain from Grain yields across the nation.

GameModifier.Provides: +5 Food per Grain for your Faction

ImprovementType.Description: Guardian Idols animate to defend the city they are built in. They can cast any spell your sovereign has access to.
Guardian Idols animate to defend the city they are built in. They can cast any spell your sovereign has access to.
Guardian Statues animate to defend the city they are built in.
Guardian Statues animate to defend the city they are built in.
Guild Grocers improve the health and well-being of the people. They will provide a global Hit Point bonus for all of a nation's units.
Allowing a Guild Lendinghouse to be built in a city will provide that nation with a huge one-time Gildar 'donation'.
Guild Tribunals manage a nation's craftsmen. They increase the Production gained from Material yields in all of that nation's cities.

GameModifier.Provides: +2 Production per Material in all your cities

ImprovementType.Description: Harbors are upgraded from Docks. They increase Gildar and Food in cities they are constructed in.
Hedge Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.

What was once a natural spring, which remained cool even in the hottest summers, became a popular destination for travelers and a place where even warring tribes could meet in peace and relax. After the cataclysm the waters of the spring were still revered and a magnificent bathhouse was built around them. It soothes the people, reducing Unrest levels and is a font of magical Water energy.
Herbalists provide Mana every Season.

The Hosten's Library will provide all cities in the nation that completes it with a boost the Research. People from around the world will flock to the nation that it is home to, increasing Faction Prestige.
Infirmaries increase Growth in a city and provide additional healing for all units stationed in the city every turn.

GameModifier.Provides: Heals 10 Hit Points per Season to all stationed units

ImprovementType.Description: Inns attract people from the wilderness to the city, increasing Growth.
Iron Mines can be built on Iron Ore. They provide Metal every Season.
The Iron Works can be upgraded from a Foundry. It will provide additional Metal every Season along with a Faction Prestige bonus to the nation able to complete it.
Irrigated Farms upgrade from Farms. They provide additional Grain yields for a city.
Kennels upgrade from Warg Dens. They provide additional Wargs every Season.
The Labor Guild will greatly improve Production and construction efficiency in the city it's built in.

GameModifier.Provides: +2 Production per Material in all your cities

ImprovementType.Description: This site is ready for construction.
Libraries increase the Research in any city they are built in.
Life Altars can be built on Life Shards. They amplify Life spells and provide Mana every season.
Life Shrines upgrade from Life Altars. They amplify Life spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Life Temples upgrade from Life Shrines. They amplify Life spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Logging Camps provide additional Production per Material yield. They can only be built on forests.
Lumber Yards upgrade from Logging Camps. They provide additional Production per Material yield.
Markets provide additional Gildar every Season in cities they are built in.
Masons improve the production and construction efficiency of cities they are built in.
Merchants are a great source of additional Gildar.
The Merchantcross Bazaar is a legendary trading center. The nation that is able to construct it will see a boost in Gildar across all their cities along with an increase to Faction Prestige.
Mills improve the production and construction efficiency of cities they are built in.
Metal is crucial for outfitting troops with the latest equipment. Mining Guilds will bring in Metal every Season without needing to find an Iron Ore resource.
The Mint of Ruvenna increases Gildar production in any city it's constructed in. This bonus scales based on the Material yields of the city.
Missionary Halls increase the Influence produced by cities they are built in.
Monuments expand the borders of the city they are built in.
This Monument greatly amplifies the power of your Death spells.
This Monument provides Metal for your nation every Season.
This Monument greatly amplifies the power of your Air spells.
This Monument greatly amplifies the power of your Life spells.
This Monument greatly amplifies the power of your Earth spells.
This Monument greatly amplifies the power of your Fire spells.
This Monument greatly amplifies the power of your Water spells.
Monuments can be built on prestigious locations. They produce Influence every Season.
This Monument will allow you to occasionally recruit Ashwake Dragons to your cause.

This throne is carved from a single piece of onyx, as brilliant and dark as the sea at night. Anyone standing before it can see their reflection within its depths, but in the reflection they are weak and prostrate. A leader with this strength of self will be able to reduce Unrest penalties across their nation.
An Oracle is a powerful source of forbidden knowledge. They increase the Essence yields of cities they are constructed in.
Orchards can be built on Fruit Groves. They provide additional Grain yields for a city.
Increases the player's borders and improves their visibility.
Decreases the cost of tactical spells cast in this outpost's borders.

GameModifier.Provides: Halves the cost of tactical spells

ImprovementType.Description: Increases the player's borders and improves their visibility.
Increases the attack of friendly units in this outpost's borders.

GameModifier.Provides: +50% Attack to friendly units in Zone of Control

ImprovementType.Description: Reduces the movement of enemy units in this outpost's borders.

GameModifier.Provides: Halves enemy units movement in Zone of Control

ImprovementType.Description: Increases the Growth of the city attached to this outpost.
Increases the defense of friendly units in this outpost's borders.

GameModifier.Provides: +25% Defense to friendly units in Zone of Control

ImprovementType.Description: Increases the borders of this outpost.
Increases movement of friendly units in this outpost's borders.

GameModifier.Provides: Doubles friendly units movement in Zone of Control

ImprovementType.Description: Most monsters won't enter the outpost's borders.
The city lucky enough to be graced with a Palace will see a Growth bonus and lower Unrest levels in the populace.
Pastures can be built on Wild Game. They provide additional Grain yields.
Piers can only be built on rivers. They increase Gildar and Food in cities they are constructed in.
Prisons reduce Unrest in all of a nation's cities, but decrease Growth in the city they are constructed in.
A legendary wonder of a past age, the Pyre of Anniellum produces Mana every season and strengthens Fire spells.
Ranches are upgraded from Stables. They provide additional Horses every Season.

The city's weak are sacrificed, reducing its Growth. All units trained here are infused with demonic energies, granting them a bonus to Hit Points and Attack. In addition a Demon spawns in the city if it is attacked.
The Sage meticulously looks over ancient texts in an effort to recover lost technologies, boosting Research.
Schools improve the Research of any city they are constructed in.
Scroll Scribes increase city Research and make scrolls that are available for champions to purchase.
Scrying Pools increase the Essence yields of any city they are built in.
The rituals of Shrines provide peace of mind for a city's citizens, reducing Unrest.
Skath Pits greatly increase the Food produced from each Grain yield in cities they are built in.
Slave Pens increase Production and construction efficiency and prevent this city's Production from being impacted by Unrest.
Slums increase the Growth of a city at the cost of elevated Unrest levels.
This site is ready for construction.
Smelters upgrade from Iron Mines. They provide you with additional Metal every Season.
Stables can be built on Wild Horses. They provide you with Horses every season.
By storing your harvest, Storehouses will allow your farmers to produce additional Food for each of your Grain yields.
Strike Garrisons give all units trained in a city the Impulsive trait (the ability to go first in combat).

GameModifier.Provides: Trained units act first in combat

ImprovementType.Description: Studies provide a minor boost to the Research of a city.
Tax Offices increase the Gildar production of any city they are constructed in.
Temples of Essence reduce Unrest and produce Mana based on the Essence of the city they are constructed in.
Tenfell University will keep a city's Unrest from reducing its Research.
The Theatre is a huge draw to new citizens. It will greatly increase Growth in the city you build it in.
The Theatre of the Wind increases the Growth and Gildar income of the city you choose to construct it in.
Timber Mills upgrade from Lumber Yards. They provide additional Production per Material yield.
The city you choose to build your Tower of Dominion in will have lower Unrest levels and increased Growth.
Breon's tower of ice, symbolic of her homeland of Nimeria, allows you to channel her power and is one of the three towers that must be constructed before work starts on the Forge of the Overlord.
Argynn's steel tower. This tower allows you to channel his power and is one of the three towers that must be constructed before work starts on the Forge of the Overlord.
Ereog's wooden tower is symbolic of his staff. This tower allows you to channel his power and is one of the three towers that must be constructed before work starts on the Forge of the Overlord.
Construct the Forge of the Overlord to be able to cast the Spell of Making and take control of the magical energies of Elemental.

GameModifier.Provides: Allows the player to cast the Spell of Making

ImprovementType.Description: The Tower of the Magi increases the spell resistance of all units produced in this city and protects the city from the spells of enemy casters.
Town Halls increase the borders of a city and reduce its Unrest level.
Devote this city to agriculture, financial and production pursuits.
Training Yards increase the Accuracy of all units trained in a city while reducing their training costs.

The Treasury Vault will greatly increase the Gildar of the nation able to construct it. It will allow them to gain interest on all Gildar they have saved up in addition to providing additional bonuses when the city with the Treasury Vault isn't constructing or training anything.

GameModifier.Provides: +30% Gildar when the city is idle

ImprovementType.Description: Underforges reduce the labor cost of producing armored units while also amplifying Earth spells.
The University will provide a substantial Research boost to the city it's constructed in.

The War College greatly increases the quality of all units trained in the city it's built in while reducing their training costs. In addition, any trained units stationed in the city with your War College will have a chance to gain free experience every Season.

GameModifier.Provides: Trained units get +25% Attack vs units of the opposite race

ImprovementType.Description: Guild Warehouses increase the Gildar a city produces when it's not constructing or training anything.

GameModifier.Provides: +50% Gildar when the city is idle

ImprovementType.Description: Warg Dens can be built on Wild Wargs. They provide Wargs every season.

Warrior Temples increase the quality of all units trained in the city they're built in while reducing their training costs. In addition, any trained units stationed in cities with Warrior Temples will have a chance to gain free experience every Season.

GameModifier.Provides: Trained Units get +25% Attack vs damaged enemies

ImprovementType.Description: Watchtowers provide cities with a Catapult for city defense and improve the Initiative of all city defenders.
Water Altars can be built on Water Shards. They amplify Water spells and provide Mana every season.
Water Altars can be built on Water Shards. They amplify Water spells and provide Mana every season.
Watermills are upgraded from Harbors. They increase Gildar, Production and Food in cities they are constructed in.
Water Shrines are upgraded from Water Altars. They amplify Water spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Water Shrines are upgraded from Water Altars. They amplify Water spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Water Temples are upgraded from Water Shrines. They amplify Water spells and provide additional Mana every season.
Water Temples are upgraded from Water Shrines. They amplify Water spells and provide additional Mana every season.
The Weaponsmith provides Attack and Defense bonuses for all trained units in a city while also greatly reducing their production costs.
Wells attract people from the wilderness to your city, increasing Growth.
Wooden Walls improve a city's defenses by providing them with additional units and giving an Initiative bonus to all City Defenders.
Workshops boost the Production a city gets from its Material yields.
